question: Which section of theÂ Scheduled Tribes and Other Traditional Forest Dwellers (Recognition of Forest Rights) Act, 2006 provides that the gram sabha, or village assembly, will initially pass a resolution recommending whose rights to which resources should be recognized?
explanation: The section 6(1) of the Scheduled Tribes and Other Traditional Forest Dwellers (Recognition of Forest Rights) Act, 2006 provides that the gram sabha, or village assembly, will initially pass a resolution recommending whose rights to which resources should be recognized.
